entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Port Colborne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:58 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Port Colborne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Colborne 10:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 2.1°C
Wind: NNE 28 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to snow mixed with rain at times heavy near midnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 9:27 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 9:27 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
